Question: This person hosted the annual Vienna New Year's Concert on PBS from 1985 to 2008, succeeded by Julie Andrews in 2009.
Hints: This person anchored the network's coverage of the 1952 presidential election as well as later conventions.
For most of the 1960s, the Huntley-Brinkley Report had more viewers than this person's broadcast.
Occupying 293 linear feet (almost 90 metres) of shelf space, the papers document this person's journalism career.
